verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> came בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַשִּׁשִּׁ֗ית <WH8345> And it came to pass in the sixth בַּשִּׁשִּׁי֙ <WH8345> in the sixth בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> [month] in the fifth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> [as] I sat בְּבֵיתִ֔י <WH1004> in mine house וְזִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> and the elders יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah יוֹשְׁבִ֣ים <WH3427> sat לְפָנָ֑י <WH6440> before וַתִּפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> fell עָלַי֙ <WH5921> on שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there יַ֖ד <WH3027> me that the hand אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> of the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וָאֶרְאֶ֗ה <WH7200> Then I beheld וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold דְמוּת֙ <WH1823> and lo a likeness כְּמַרְאֵה־ <WH4758> as the appearance אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> of fire מִמַּרְאֵ֥ה <WH4758> from the appearance מָתְנָ֛יו <WH4975> of his loins וּלְמַ֖טָּה <WH4295> even downward אֵ֑שׁ <WH784> fire וּמִמָּתְנָ֣יו <WH4975> and from his loins וּלְמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> even upward כְּמַרְאֵה־ <WH4758> as the appearance זֹ֖הַר <WH2096> of brightness כְּעֵ֥ין <WH5869> as the colour הַחַשְׁמַֽלָה׃ <WH2830> of amber

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> And he put forth תַּבְנִ֣ית <WH8403> the form יָ֔ד <WH3027> of an hand וַיִּקָּחֵ֖נִי <WH3947> and took בְּצִיצִ֣ת <WH6734> me by a lock רֹאשִׁ֑י <WH7218> of mine head וַתִּשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> lifted me up אֹתִ֣י <WH853> ר֣וּחַ ׀ <WH7307> and the spirit בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> between the earth וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between הַשָּׁמַ֡יִם <WH8064> and the heaven וַתָּבֵא֩ <WH935> and brought אֹתִ֨י <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלְַ֜מָה <WH3389> to Jerusalem בְּמַרְא֣וֹת <WH4759> me in the visions אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֜תַח <WH6607> to the door שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> gate הַפְּנִימִית֙ <WH6442> of the inner הַפּוֹנֶ֣ה <WH6437> that looketh צָפ֔וֹנָה <WH6828> toward the north אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> in it מוֹשַׁ֔ב <WH4186> where [was] the seat סֵ֖מֶל <WH5566> of the image הַקִּנְאָ֥ה <WH7068> of jealousy הַמַּקְנֶֽה׃ <WH7069> which provoketh to jealousy

וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there כְּב֖וֹד <WH3519> And behold the glory אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כַּמַּרְאֶ֕ה <WH4758> [was] there according to the vision אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> that I saw בַּבִּקְעָֽה׃ <WH1237> in the plain

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> he unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man שָׂא־ <WH5375> lift up נָ֥א <WH4994> now עֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> thine eyes דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> now the way צָפ֑וֹנָה <WH6828> toward the north וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> So I lifted up עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> mine eyes דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> the way צָפ֔וֹנָה <WH6828> toward the north וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold מִצָּפוֹן֙ <WH6828> and behold northward לְשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> at the gate הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> of the altar סֵ֛מֶל <WH5566> this image הַקִּנְאָ֥ה <WH7068> of jealousy הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this בַּבִּאָֽה׃ <WH872> in the entry

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> He said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> furthermore unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man הֲרֹאֶ֥ה <WH7200> seest אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you [מֵהֵם כ] (מָ֣ה ק) (הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like ק) עֹשִׂ֑ים <WH6213> thou what they do תּוֹעֵב֨וֹת <WH8441> abominations גְּדֹל֜וֹת <WH1419> ? [even] the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> that the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל ׀ <WH3478> of Israel עֹשִׂ֣ים <WH6213> committeth פֹּ֗ה <WH6311> here לְרָֽחֳקָה֙ <WH7368> here that I should go far off מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> and מִקְדָּשִׁ֔י <WH4720> chapel וְעוֹד֙ <WH5750> again תָּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> still תִּרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> thee yet again [and] thou shalt see תּוֹעֵב֖וֹת <WH8441> abominations גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ <WH1419> greater ס

וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> And he brought אֹתִ֖י <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> me to the door הֶֽחָצֵ֑ר <WH2691> of the court וָאֶרְאֶ֕ה <WH7200> and when I looked וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold חֹר־ <WH2356> hole אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> behold a בַּקִּֽיר׃ <WH7023> in the wall

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> he unto me Son אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man חֲתָר־ <WH2864> dig נָ֣א <WH4994> now בַקִּ֑יר <WH7023> now in the wall וָאֶחְתֹּ֣ר <WH2864> and when I had digged בַּקִּ֔יר <WH7023> in the wall וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> and behold פֶּ֥תַח <WH6607> door אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> behold a

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me בֹּ֤א <WH935> unto me Go in וּרְאֵה֙ <WH7200> and behold אֶת־ <WH853> הַתּוֹעֵב֣וֹת <WH8441> abominations הָרָע֔וֹת <WH7451> the wicked אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they עֹשִׂ֖ים <WH6213> that they do פֹּֽה׃ <WH6311> here

וָאָבוֹא֮ <WH935> So I went in וָֽאֶרְאֶה֒ <WH7200> and saw וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold כָל־ <WH3605> every תַּבְנִ֜ית <WH8403> and behold every form רֶ֤מֶשׂ <WH7431> of creeping things וּבְהֵמָה֙ <WH929> beasts שֶׁ֔קֶץ <WH8263> and abominable וְכָל־ <WH3605> all גִּלּוּלֵ֖י <WH1544> and all the idols בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel מְחֻקֶּ֥ה <WH2707> pourtrayed עַל־ <WH5921> on הַקִּ֖יר <WH7023> upon the wall סָבִ֥יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> around

וְשִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> them seventy אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> men מִזִּקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> of the ancients בֵֽית־ <WH1004> of the house יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> of Israel וְיַאֲזַנְיָ֨הוּ <WH2970> Jaazaniah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁפָ֜ן <WH8227> of Shaphan עֹמֵ֤ד <WH5975> And there stood בְּתוֹכָם֙ <WH8432> and in the midst עֹמְדִ֣ים <WH5975> of them stood לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6440> before וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> with every man מִקְטַרְתּ֖וֹ <WH4730> his censer בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וַעֲתַ֥ר <WH6282> and a thick עֲנַֽן־ <WH6051> cloud הַקְּטֹ֖רֶת <WH7004> of incense עֹלֶֽה׃ <WH5927> went up

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלַי֮ <WH413> about הֲרָאִ֣יתָ <WH7200> hast thou seen בֶן־ <WH1121> he unto me Son אָדָם֒ <WH120> of man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> what זִקְנֵ֤י <WH2205> what the ancients בֵֽית־ <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel עֹשִׂ֣ים <WH6213> do בַּחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> in the dark אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man בְּחַדְרֵ֣י <WH2315> in the chambers מַשְׂכִּית֑וֹ <WH4906> of his carved כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֹמְרִ֗ים <WH559> said אֵ֤ין <WH369> else יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God רֹאֶ֣ה <WH7200> seeth אֹתָ֔נוּ <WH853> עָזַ֥ב <WH5800> hath forsaken יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> He said אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me ע֣וֹד <WH5750> Yet תָּשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> also unto me Turn תִּרְאֶ֛ה <WH7200> thee yet again [and] thou shalt see תּוֹעֵב֥וֹת <WH8441> abominations גְּדֹל֖וֹת <WH1419> greater אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> they עֹשִֽׂים׃ <WH6213> that they do

וַיָּבֵ֣א <WH935> Then he brought אֹתִ֗י <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> toward פֶּ֙תַח֙ <WH6607> me to the door שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> of the gate בֵּית־ <WH1004> house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַצָּפ֑וֹנָה <WH6828> which [was] toward the north וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there הַנָּשִׁ֣ים <WH802> women יֹֽשְׁב֔וֹת <WH3427> and behold there sat מְבַכּ֖וֹת <WH1058> weeping אֶת־ <WH853> הַתַּמּֽוּז׃ <WH8542> for Tammuz ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me הֲרָאִ֣יתָ <WH7200> he unto me Hast thou seen בֶן־ <WH1121> [this] O son אָדָ֑ם <WH120> man ע֣וֹד <WH5750> again תָּשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> still תִּרְאֶ֛ה <WH7200> thee yet again [and] thou shalt see תּוֹעֵב֥וֹת <WH8441> abominations גְּדֹל֖וֹת <WH1419> greater מֵאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וַיָּבֵ֣א <WH935> And he brought אֹתִ֗י <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about חֲצַ֣ר <WH2691> court בֵּית־ <WH1004> house יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> of the LORD'S הַפְּנִימִית֒ <WH6442> me into the inner וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold פֶ֜תַח <WH6607> and behold at the door הֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> of the temple יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD בֵּ֤ין <WH996> between הָֽאוּלָם֙ <WH197> between the porch וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> and the altar כְּעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty וַחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <WH2568> [were] about five אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> men אֲחֹ֨רֵיהֶ֜ם <WH268> with their backs אֶל־ <WH413> to הֵיכַ֤ל <WH1964> toward the temple יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD וּפְנֵיהֶ֣ם <WH6440> and their faces קֵ֔דְמָה <WH6924> toward the east וְהֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> and they מִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֥ם <WH7812> and they worshipped קֵ֖דְמָה <WH6924> toward the east לַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> the sun

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then he said אֵלַי֮ <WH413> to me הֲרָאִ֣יתָ <WH7200> unto me Hast thou seen בֶן־ <WH1121> [this] O son אָדָם֒ <WH120> man הֲנָקֵל֙ <WH7043> A thing לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> to the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah מֵעֲשׂ֕וֹת <WH6213> that they commit אֶת־ <WH853> הַתּוֹעֵב֖וֹת <WH8441> the abominations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָֽשׂוּ־ <WH6213> which they commit פֹ֑ה <WH6311> here כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מָלְא֨וּ <WH4390> here? for they have filled אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> the land חָמָ֗ס <WH2555> with violence וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> and have returned לְהַכְעִיסֵ֔נִי <WH3707> to provoke me to anger וְהִנָּ֛ם <WH2005> behold שֹׁלְחִ֥ים <WH7971> and lo they put אֶת־ <WH853> הַזְּמוֹרָ֖ה <WH2156> the branch אֶל־ <WH413> to אַפָּֽם׃ <WH639> to their nose

וְגַם־ <WH1571> indeed אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> Therefore will I also deal בְחֵמָ֔ה <WH2534> in fury לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תָח֥וֹס <WH2347> shall not spare עֵינִ֖י <WH5869> mine eye וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor אֶחְמֹ֑ל <WH2550> neither will I have pity וְקָרְא֤וּ <WH7121> and though they cry בְאָזְנַי֙ <WH241> in mine ears ק֣וֹל <WH6963> voice גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> with a loud וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor אֶשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> [yet] will I not hear אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>
